title: Week 1 Recap 2022
description:
Field Yates, Daniel Dopp and Mike Clay recap everything you need to know from Week 1 of the NFL season including what big performances are signs of things to come. Plus, Liz Loza joins to recap Sunday Night Football.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: Recapping Everything You Need To Know From Week 1
